metadata.title: ELSA-2023-28765:  cross-gcc security update (LOW)
metadata.description:
[12.1.1-2.0.4]
- CVE-2023-4039 mitigation.
  Orabug 35752028.
- Reviewed-by: Jose E. Marchesi <jose.marchesi@oracle.com>
